Class InventoryTest

java.lang.Object
src.Test.InventoryTest
class InventoryTest extends Object
Unit tests for the Inventory class. This class contains tests to verify the functionality of the Inventory class.

  • Method Details

    • setUp

      @BeforeEach public void setUp()
      Sets up the test environment before each test. Initializes the Inventory instance using the specified game data file.

    • testGetSelectedItemsInitiallyEmpty

      @Test public void testGetSelectedItemsInitiallyEmpty()
      Tests the getSelectedItems method. Verifies that the selected items list is initially empty.

    • testGetSelectedItemsAfterSelection

      @Test public void testGetSelectedItemsAfterSelection()
      Tests the getSelectedItems method. Verifies that items can be selected and retrieved correctly.

    • testGetEmojiForItem

      @Test public void testGetEmojiForItem()
      Tests the getEmojiForItem method. Verifies that the correct emoji is returned for a given item name.
